description: Land Acquisition - Kottawa, Maharagama D/S Division, Colombo District - Lot Nos. 250-274 and 162-245 of the land Mahakandegama and Lot Nos. 322-363 in Hadeerawalana Pahala and Lot Nos. 171-306 in Wallawa, Kurunegala D/S Division, Kurunegala District - Amendment to the notice published in Gaz. Ex. Ord. No. 1877/29 of 28.08.2014 by R.D.A.
